trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET mobile Web Forms pages.
trans-unit.target: 作為所有 ASP.NET Mobile Web Forms 網頁的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage> class inherits from the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage>類別繼承自 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>類別。

trans-unit.source: To specify a mobile page and use ASP.NET mobile controls, an ASP.NET mobile Web Forms page must contain the following page directive.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定在行動網頁並使用 ASP.NET 行動控制項，ASP.NET 行動 Web Forms 網頁必須包含下列頁面指示詞。

trans-unit.source: The `Inherits` attribute is required.
trans-unit.target: `Inherits` 屬性 (Attribute) 是必要項。

trans-unit.source: The `Language` attribute is set to the language that is used on the page, if it is needed.
trans-unit.target: `Language`必要時屬性設定為在頁面上，使用的語言。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET mobile pages allow for multiple mobile forms on each page, whereas ASP.NET Web pages allow for only one form per page.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 行動網頁允許多個行動裝置的表單，在每個頁面上，而每個分頁只能有一個表單可讓 ASP.NET Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.target: 取得目前頁面的根 URL。

trans-unit.source: A rooted URL to the current page.
trans-unit.target: 至目前頁面的根 URL。

trans-unit.source: A rooted URL is absolute with regard to the server, but it is not a complete URL because it does not include the protocol prefix or server name.
trans-unit.target: 根的 URL 為絕對路徑在伺服器上，但它不是完整的 URL，因為它不包含通訊協定前置詞或伺服器名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page's currently active form.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面目前的作用中表單。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The page's currently active form.
trans-unit.target: 頁面的目前作用中表單。

trans-unit.source: When a page is initially rendered, the first form in the page is automatically made active.
trans-unit.target: 一開始轉譯頁面時，會自動成為使用中頁面第一種形式。

trans-unit.source: On subsequent postbacks, another form might be made active, either by programmatically setting this property, or as a result of user navigation through a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link> control.
trans-unit.target: 在後續回傳時，另一種形式可能會成為使用中，以程式設計方式設定這個屬性，或因為使用者瀏覽<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.ActiveForm%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.ActiveForm%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the current mobile device allows for access keys for controls, the button will display the access key that submits the form.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的行動裝置允許控制項的便捷鍵，則按鈕會顯示送出表單的存取金鑰。

trans-unit.target: 頁面未包含任何表單。

trans-unit.source: This member overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form> or a <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> before it calls the base method.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以判斷控制項是否<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form>或<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>再呼叫基底方法。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a `Form` or a `UserControl` object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.Forms%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是`Form`或`UserControl`物件<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.Forms%2A>屬性設定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: 代表已剖析項目的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the page that an element was parsed, and adds the element to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 告知控制項已解析項目，並將項目加入至 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Unless you override it, this method automatically adds <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> objects to the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 除非您覆寫它，此方法會自動將<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>物件加入伺服器控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: This collection can be accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可以透過存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This member overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the object is a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet> before it calls the base method.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以判斷物件是否<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet>再呼叫基底方法。

trans-unit.source: If the object is of type `StyleSheet`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.StyleSheet%2A> property is set to the `o` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件型別的`StyleSheet`、<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.StyleSheet%2A>屬性設定為`o`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.StyleSheet" /> property has already been set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.StyleSheet" /> 屬性已設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether controls on the page can have custom attributes defined.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出頁面上的控制項是否可以具有已經定義的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the value of the <see langword="allowCustomAttributes" /> attribute of the <<see langword="mobilecontrols" />> section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 Web.config 檔案的 <<see langword="mobilecontrols" />> 區段的 <see langword="allowCustomAttributes" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the controls on the page can have custom attributes defined; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果頁面上的控制項可以具有已經定義的自訂屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor> interface, the ASP.NET page framework provides a `CustomAttributes` dictionary that allows you to specify additional attributes, enable or disable custom attributing, or adjust a control's behavior or rendering.
trans-unit.target: 除了<xref:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor>介面，提供 ASP.NET 網頁架構`CustomAttributes`字典，其中可讓您指定其他屬性、 啟用或停用自訂屬性設定，或調整控制項的行為或轉譯。

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable custom attributing, you can either set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.AllowCustomAttributes%2A> property to `true`, or you can set the `allowCustomAttributes` attribute of the <`mobileControls`> section of Web.config to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用或停用自訂屬性設定，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.AllowCustomAttributes%2A>屬性`true`，或者您可以設定`allowCustomAttributes`屬性 <`mobileControls`> Web.config 的區段`true`。

trans-unit.source: When custom attributes are enabled, typographic errors in property names can be interpreted as custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性啟用時，屬性名稱中的印刷錯誤可解譯為自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a developer incorrectly specifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property of a control as "Txet", the parser would save it as a custom attribute called "Txet" instead of raising an exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果開發人員未正確指定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>"Txet 」 為控制項的屬性，剖析器會將它儲存為自訂屬性，稱為 「 Txet"而非引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, custom attributes are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，預設會停用的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.AllowCustomAttributes%2A> property to enable the custom `AccessKey` attribute on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.AllowCustomAttributes%2A>屬性來啟用自訂`AccessKey`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 或衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 的文字寫入器，例如

trans-unit.source: This member overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.DeterminePostBackMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the page was requested because of a transfer or a redirect.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.DeterminePostBackMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以判斷是否由於傳輸或重新導向要求的頁面。

trans-unit.source: If so, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果是這樣，`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the `DeterminePostBackMode` method of the adapter is called.
trans-unit.target: 否則，`DeterminePostBackMode`呼叫配接器的方法。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET controls create client-side scripts to raise postback events on the server.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 控制項建立來引發回傳事件的伺服器上的用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for a malicious user to use the postback script to send arbitrary post events to server controls.
trans-unit.target: 它是惡意的使用者，可以將任意張貼事件傳送至伺服器控制項使用回傳的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, ASP.NET version 2.0 controls validate the event data to ensure that the event was raised by client-side code rendered by the control.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，ASP.NET 2.0 控制項驗證事件資料，以確保此事件由控制項所呈現的用戶端程式碼引起。

trans-unit.source: Event validation is not supported in mobile pages.
trans-unit.target: 行動頁面不被支援事件驗證。

trans-unit.source: The query string that accompanied the request.
trans-unit.target: 要求中附帶的查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: The property returns any characters in the request that follow the question mark (?) in the URL.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會傳回任何字元，請遵循問號 （？），在 URL 中的要求中。

trans-unit.source: This value can be different from the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以不同於<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For devices where a unique file path suffix is inserted into a URL for postback, this property automatically strips out the file path suffix.
trans-unit.target: 針對裝置而唯一的檔案路徑後置詞插入回傳的 URL，這個屬性將會自動移除檔案路徑後置詞。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the original query is "/home.aspx?id=john+doe", the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.QueryStringText%2A> property will be "id=john+doe".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果原始的查詢是 「 / home.aspx?id=john+doe"的值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.QueryStringText%2A>屬性會是"id = john doe"。

trans-unit.source: A following postback URL could be "/home.aspx?_ufps=20292303920&id=john+doe".
trans-unit.target: URL 可能是下列回傳"/home.aspx?_ufps=20292303920 與 id = john doe"。

trans-unit.source: On this last postback, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.QueryStringText%2A> property will again be "id=john+doe", because the unique suffix will be stripped out.
trans-unit.target: 在這個最後一個回傳值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.QueryStringText%2A>屬性一次會是"id = john doe"，因為移除唯一的尾碼。

trans-unit.source: If the key portion of the key/value pair stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.QueryStringText%2A> property is the same as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of a control on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage> object, the view state and the key/value pair are removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.QueryStringText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引鍵/值組的索引鍵部分儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.QueryStringText%2A>屬性等同於<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>上控制項的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage>物件、 檢視狀態和索引鍵/值組會從<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.QueryStringText%2A>屬性。
